thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk
thread.title: Eleanor Hickman

author: Eleanor Hickman
title: Eleanor Hickman
text: Start by viewing the web site, there's an excellent selection of blinds to choose from. The instructions for measuring your window recess are very helpful. Enter measurements etc. to obtain Quote: . The prices are very competitive. Delivery time was excellent. Packaging was excellent. The blinds came with fitting instructions, which was helpful. The quality of the blind was excellent. They've been up a few weeks now, they operate nice and smoothly, hang well and look great in our patio window.
